nodes.caption: Attaching importance to steering the quality of education (AISG)
Thinking the school board can contribute to the quality of education (CQ)
Perceiving that school(s) management is sticking to its management role (MR)

Characteristics of the school board: -setting targets/agreeing on learning outcomes (SGBLO, SVBLO) -holding itself accountable to different horizontal stakeholders (AMV, APG, ATCM, APA, AQA, ATS, ALEA) -supervisory board? (SV) -number of school (NS) -number of board members (NM) -men in board (PM) -parents in board (PP) -education level board members (PHE, PAE)
Having a picture of the quality of education (PQ)
